alert.note: Alert for Crowley County; Eastern Kiowa County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 09 at 3:58AM MST until March 10 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Crowley, Otero, and Kiowa Counties. * WHEN...From 2 PM this afternoon to 11 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... Blowing snow is possible during this time period, which would lead to lower visibility and drifting snow. The cold wind chills as low as 10 below zero could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Crowley County; Eastern Kiowa County; La Junta Vicinity, Otero County; Western Kiowa County
